channel.title: Lighting Issues
channel.description: I'm having issues with the game being too dark. When the game initially loads, it's perfectly bright, but then slowly darkens to the point where I can barely see anything. I've already attempted to adjust this in the advanced video settings and following a few suggestions on other threads but with no effect. Any suggestions?

item.title: Lighting Issues
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
A fix was finally discovered.

To Fix The Over Darkening Issue
Type the following two commands into console

mat_hdr_level 2
mat_tonemapping_occlusion_use_stencil 1
